item.title: Strictly Come Dancing - Series 23: Launch Show
item.description: Strictly is back! Fifteen new famous faces are paired with their professional dancers.

item.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: Twelve singles take a leap of dating faith and try to find love.

item.title: Deep Ocean: Kingdom of the Coelacanth
item.description: David Attenborough discusses the coelacanth, a living fossil hidden for 400 million years.

item.title: Juice - Series 2: 1. Sup
item.description: Alone and jobless, Jamma's lost after splitting with Guy. Sparks fly when they meet again.

item.title: Trying - Series 1: 1. Nikki and Jason
item.description: Unable to conceive naturally, Nikki and Jason embark on the path of adoption.

item.title: Rob and Rylan's Passage to India - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: In Delhi, Rob and Rylan try rapping and puppeteering, and discover a tomb with a view.

item.title: Stacey & Joe - Series 2: 1. I Caught a Big One
item.description: Joe’s lake plans dry up, whilst Stacey’s birthday plans make quite a splash.

item.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: Tir Dhondy retraces Sarm's steps before her disappearance from a charter yacht in 2021.

item.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: Zara McDermott explores backpacker life and begins her Thai adventure.

item.title: The Newsreader - Series 3: 1. Night of Nights
item.description: Helen and Dale are reaching new peaks of success in 1989. Dale is nominated for a Logie.

item.title: The Guest - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: When Ria is hired to clean for wealthy businesswoman Fran, her life is changed forever.

item.title: King & Conqueror - Series 1: 1. Invitation
item.description: Harold of Wessex and William of Normandy encounter each other for the first time.

item.title: Casualty - 9: Supply and Demand: Episode 12
item.description: In an action-packed finale, Iain finds himself on his most frightening mission yet.

item.title: Johnny Mathis at the BBC
item.description: A deep dive into the BBC’s archives to celebrate romantic balladeer Johnny Mathis.

item.title: Jimi Hendrix - Electric Church
item.description: Documentary about America's last great rock festival and Jimi Hendrix's performance there.

item.description: Three years after transforming the lives of a group of lads with cricket, Freddie returns.

item.description: Tommy’s at rock bottom after the worst year of his life, but he’s planning a comeback.

item.description: Railway enthusiast Michael Portillo leads a landmark journey through 200 years of rail.

item.title: Before I Go to Sleep
item.description: Thriller about a woman who wakes up every morning with no memory of her recent years.

item.title: Knocked Up
item.description: A one-night stand leads to an unexpected pregnancy and a crash course in growing up.

item.title: Horrible Histories: The Movie
item.description: A Roman boy and a Celtic girl get caught up in Boudicca’s revolt against Nero’s army.

item.title: MasterChef - Series 21: Episode 1
item.description: The UK's best amateur cooks compete to win the coveted MasterChef trophy.

item.title: The Great British Sewing Bee - Series 11: Episode 1
item.description: The Great British Sewing Bee returns with 12 brand new sewers.

item.title: Twiggy
item.description: A look at the life and career of the iconic 1960s model Twiggy.

item.title: Murder Case - The Vanishing Cyclist: Episode 1
item.description: One phone call changes everything as dark secrets emerge in the hunt for Tony Parsons.

item.title: Panorama - Trump and Starmer: A Special Relationship?
item.description: What is the state of the historic special relationship between the US and the UK?

item.title: Mrs Brown's Boys - Series 5: 1. The Mammy Effect
item.description: Agnes is podcast-famous! Cathy’s not thrilled.

item.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
item.description: Centuries-old vampire Count Dracula comes to England.

item.title: Scream
item.description: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorised by a new killer.

item.title: Top Gear - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and Jason Dawe are joined by Harry Enfield.

item.title: Dark Hearts - Series 2: Episode 1
item.description: After Sab's capture, Group 45 takes in two new members and Pierre, a DGSE agent.

item.description: The team work together after the shooting, and Mo learns the truth about his father.

item.description: When a sailor is found dead on submarine HMS Vigil, DCI Silva flies out to investigate.

item.description: Rose Tyler meets a mysterious stranger called the Doctor, and realises Earth is in danger.
